comments:
1. Open a file inplace (I opened a html document with Netscape 4.76 inside 
Eclipse)
2. Close it
   -> Dialog asks if I want to save.
3. Press "No"

==> Dialog: Internal error - An internal error has occurred. See error log for 
mote details.

Switching to other editors does no longer work. Perspective is unusable i.e. 
destroyed. I have to close it and open a new one.
